text: Kwavija heyo yalongile, “sambiutende ugoni,”2:11 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha KUHALAWA 20:14; NG'HUMBUKILA YA TOLATI 5:18. vivija kalonga, “sambiukome.”2:11 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha KUHALAWA 20:13; NG'HUMBUKILA YA TOLATI 5:17. Na ihawa hutenda ugoni ila kokoma, kugaluka mkeng'enha Malagizo higo.
